name.baseName: Pulping ; Semi-chemical pulp ; Rice and wheat straw ; Alkali pulping ; All sizes; NESPS2
制浆 ; 半化学浆 ; 稻麦草 ; 碱法制浆 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisChemical coagulation + anaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment + chemical coagulation，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management98.01

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisChemical coagulation + anaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment + chemical coagulation，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management98.01
technology.technologicalApplicability: 该半化学浆制浆过程采用碱法对稻麦草进行处理，生产适用于各种纸产品的浆料。该过程适用于所有规模的制浆设施。所述末端处理技术用于处理废水，特别是针对化学需氧量（COD）等污染参数。处理过程包括化学混凝、厌氧生物处理、好氧生物处理和氧化还原过程。该处理链设计用于实现高效的污染物去除，有助于满足环境规章对排放的要求。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码22,三级代码221.0,四级代码2212文件，在完整版文件中第492页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: 源文件中描述为为半化学浆，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Waste wateris/，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
污染物指标工业废水量的末端治理技术是/。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为工业废水量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisChemical coagulation + anaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment + redox process，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management98.86，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
污染物指标化学需氧量的末端治理技术是化学混凝法+厌氧生物处理法+好氧生物处理法+氧化还原法，其效率为98.86，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=环保设施实际运行小时数（小时）/环保设施应运行小时数（小时）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为化学需氧量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisChemical coagulation + anaerobic biological treatment + aerobic biological treatment + chemical coagulation，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management98.01
污染物指标化学需氧量的末端治理技术是化学混凝法+厌氧生物处理法+好氧生物处理法+化学混凝法，其效率为98.01，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=环保设施实际运行小时数（小时）/环保设施应运行小时数（小时）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为化学需氧量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
